author: Carl Wiman
description: Carl Wiman says of his drink, “El Lingüista means ‘the linguist.’ This cocktail is inspired by how communication leads to understanding, and how this profoundly influences us as human beings. Studying language – our principle means of communication - is the first step on the path to change.”
name: El Lingüista

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass
